abstract: The stock market dropped last week on Congressional testimony of Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, on Wednesday.
snippet: The stock market dropped last week on Congressional testimony of Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The stock market dropped last week on Congressional testimony of Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, on Wednesday.

headline.main: Bernanke Speaks, and the Market Retreats
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Speaks, and the Market Retreats
